title: Ekko Build path
body:
i'm sure there have been a few of these made but i havn't really been on the forums for quite a while, anyway, i have been watching a lot! of videos and gameplays of ekko and i absolutely love his style as much of the community do, i would just like to get down pat a decent item rush/essential list and a few situational items.

 for instance flask, boots, or dorans for mid/top i've notice his only large mana consumption is on his q which is a relatively short cooldown, so would dorans be enough for efficient trading without draining the mana pool too much.

i'd like to think i would rush ludens echo but maybe buy a sheen first for dueling capabilities but i argue this because all i've heard is how much he stacks off raw ap, also is CDR not worth building, mainly morello as that is majority of mid laners ap first item.

i was also thinking zhonya's maybe even second item after ludens and sheen, but seeing as he is so strong with raw ap maybe void staff and sorc boots would have to slingshot his damage but the outplay potential of zhonyas in the earlier game have a 4 second lagging ult and a 3 second stun a 2.5 second invulnerable should surely be bought as soon as possible.

i also played around with the idea of RoA i mean it makes his scaling a bit slower but gives him that much needed hp and mana might be a safer item sequence if your vsing a stronger laner, because there is no need for rylais with his ridiculous slows and lack of ranged abilities, how about the new abyssal scepter ? it contradicts his ratios but coincides with his AOE damage and lack of HP and resists. 

would it be worth while building a tear? for that huge spike of seraphs embrace and deathcap and would also solve his mana issues.

nashors tooth ? i understand his passive only pops on each target once every 3 seconds but the passive magic damage on hit would surely be good and gives a decent chunk of CDR

what about triforce? i see the unnecessary in this but if your going for a tankier ekko why not, i mean it gives you an empowered auto attack, movement speed and on hit move speed which would be great for chasing down enemies which is pretty much ekko's thing

anyway thats just a few of my thoughts any ideas/feedback would be great to discuss

replies.body: i think lich bane and ludens is a necessity
Pretty much just going to follow my Twisted Fate build path for this guy. Likes on hit damage scalers, likes poke damage amplifiers, and loves hardcore AP and HP.
